com.optimizely.ab.android.shared

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.optimizely.ab.android.shared.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    Functionality common to all clients using http connections

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Client.Request<T>
      Bundles up a request allowing it's execution to be deferred

      • execute

        public <T> T execute(Client.Request<T> request,
                     int timeout,
                     int power)
        Executes a request with exponential backoff
        Type Parameters:
        T - the response type of the request
        Parameters:
        request - the request executable, would be a lambda on Java 8
        timeout - the numerical base for the exponential backoff
        power - the number of retries
        Returns:
        the response
